content: द्रु {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (द्रवति, द्रुत; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} द्रुद्रूषति) {@--1@} To run, flow, run away, retreat, fly (often with <ab>acc.</ab>); यथा नदीनां बहवोंबुऽवेगाः समुद्रमेवाभिमुखं द्रवंति <ls>Bg. 11. 28</ls>; रक्षांसि भीतानि दिशां द्रवंति <ls n="Bg. 11.">36</ls>; द्रुतं द्रवत कौरवाः <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To rush, attack, assault quickly; <ls>Bk. 9. 95.</ls> {@--3@} To become fluid, dissolve, melt, ooze (<ab>fig.</ab> also); द्रवति च हिमरश्मावुद्रते चंद्रकांतः <ls>Māl. 1. 24</ls>; <ls n="Māl.">8. 12</ls>; <ls>U. 6. 12</ls>; <ls>Pt. 4. 33</ls>; द्रवति हृदयमेतत् <ls>Ve. 5. 21</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 9</ls>; <ls>Bk. 2. 12.</ls> {@--4@} To go, move. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (द्रावयति-ते) {@--1@} To cause to run away, put to flight. {@--2@} To melt, fuse. {vII.v} {c5c} <ab>P.</ab> (द्रुणोति) {@--1@} To hurt, injure; तं दुद्रावाद्रिणा कपिः <ls>Bk. 14. 81</ls>, <ls n="Bk. 14.">85.</ls> {@--2@} To go. {@--3@} To repent.

द्रु {%<ab>m.</ab>%} {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [द्रवत्यूर्ध्वं द्रु-बा°-डु] {@--1@} Wood. {@--2@} Any instrument made of wood. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A tree; <ls>Ms. 7. 131.</ls> {@--2@} A branch. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} Motion.
